page.title: 11A NORMAL EVENING,B.HILL
page.content: I come out of school carrying my lunch box.My mum is normally talking to her friends or looking for my little brother.When we get home I put all my school things on the sideboard in the kitchen.I go upstairs to change into my jogging suit,check my rabbits and then go and play with my friends, either on the road or in someones garden.Sometimes we go to our sweetshop .At 6.00 I have my tea (normally fish & chips).About 7.00 my dad comes in and we watch T.V.. At about 9.30 I go to bed, with a book (starring Sally J.Freedman As Herself by Judy Blume.) When I have read a chapter I go to sleep.I shake my pillow,my bed feels warm and comfy , I stare at the ceiling until I finally doze off!
